Amy's apartment, somewhere in Station Square.

Tails has two fish that look the same. They kinda look like puffer fish, except they don't have have places where spines would be. Their skin is a little bit more rubbery. "Uhm, Tails, those look an an awful lot like puffer fish."

11111221.content:
With a sudden lift, Amy and Tails lift off the ground. They both yell and wave their hands and feet while they rise.

"Me and my big mouth!" Amy cries.

"Oh boy" said Tails worryingly as they rose high over the ocean below them, the wind taking them out to sea. "How are we gonna get out of this one."

Suddenly Tails hears Amy laughing. Tails turns his round body so that his head was facing Amy. "What are you laughing at!? This is serious!"

Amy continued to laugh. "I'm sorry, Tails" she said between fits. "You just look so cute like that"

Tails calms down and blushes. Really thinking about it, he thought Amy looked nice too.

Suddenly Tails smiled. "You know what? You look really cute too."

Amy giggled. "Aww, thanks my no longer little fox boy." She swims her form over to Tails and takes his hands. "So this is what flying is like. But, I have to admit, this balloon stuff feels really good."

Again, Tails paused to think. He ran a hand over himself, feeling how squishy his ballon form was, as if he could take more. He wiggled his legs and felt them smoosh against his body, and he giggled from how wonderful he felt. "This is pretty good. We might as well enjoy it. It doesn't look like we will be going anywhere for a while."

Amy nodded. "And I know just how we should have fun" she said, and kissed Tails while grabbing as much of him as she could. Tails yellped for a secong, then grabbed amy and kissed back, noticing how nice it was to kiss without gravity weighing him down. As they kissed, something suddenly happened.
11111221.title: They do float off the ground.

Just as she covers her mouth, Amy sees that yet another bizzare change was taking place. She watches as the parts sticking out of Tails' body slowly sink in. Then, she realizes the same thing is happening to herself.

Tails sighs. "This is gonna be a long night..." he says, as his his head and tails finish sinking in, making him a completely round orange and white ball. Amy's the same, except she's pink and tan, respectively.

Tails blinks. "Whoa. This is weird...we went from being balloon animals to sphereical...animals..." he says, coming at a loss of words for their situation.

Amy smiles. "Yea...but it is starting to feel nice."

As he says this...

Their new situation seems to please them, though. "Mmm...this is rather nice, huh?" Tails asks.

"I agree...this is great, Tails." She says, as her face meets up with Tails'. Natually, they take this opertunity to lip lock each other.

"Mmmmrrrr...what a lovely way to kiss..." Amy says, as they float higher into the air.

As soon as she says that, they stop growing.

The two hold their kiss as they continue to rise into the air. As their bodies reach 1,000 feet wide, they feel themselves start to creak and tremble all over. They start to feel tingly as they near their bursting point.

Amy grins around the kiss. "It looks like this is it, Tails...but I feel really good about it."

"And so do I...we'll be going out together, after all...I love you, Amy."

Amy quietly giggles. "As do I, Tails." she says.

Just before they burst, the couple murr happily, which is followed closely by the loud bang that is made from their bodies bursting, with Amy bursting just a moment before Tails.



...HAPPY END.

He gets bigger and bigger and he spat out the hose. "It's your turn." He said while putting the hose in Amy's mouth. She begins to expand as well. 1112.content:
Tails returns with two fish. One looks like it has a rubbery sheen, but the other looks like a normal fish.

"So, which one do you want, Amy?" Tails asks.

Amy scratches her head. "Uhm...I'll take the shiny one." Amy says. "It looks cleaner."

Tails nods, and then cooks the fish.

---

Amy is laying down next to Tails, as he rubs her fish filled stomach. Amy grins. "Thanks, Tails. This is really helping that stomach ache I had from the fish."

Tails chuckles. "Well, you did eat a pretty big fish." Tails says, as he pats his equally filled belly.

Suddenly, Tails feels Amy's belly rumble a bit. "Uhm...your stomach seems to be having a hard time digesting the fish."

Amy burps. "Excuse me." she says, gigging a bit.

Tails smiles. "No problem." he says.

Amy picks herself off the ground, and walks foward a bit. "Well, what should we do now, Tails?" She says, but she doesn't get a responce. "Tails?" She turns, to see that Tails is stareing at her.

"Tails, why exactly are you looking at me like that?" she asks.

Tails blinks. "Uhm...because you're growing...didn't you notice?" Tails says.

Apparently, she didn't, as she is suprised to see that she's getting round. Her arms and legs are already halfway gone, and are quickly being absorbed into her body.

Amy gulps. "Tails, what am I going to do?"

"Get round. What else?" Tails says, somewhat sarcastic.

Amy's limbs are completely gone. Her hands, feet, and head are starting to sink in as well. She is glaring at Tails. "How am I going to fix this?" she says.

Tails watches as her hands and feet sink in, causing her gloves and shoes to fall off. "Uhm...I don't really know. I've never seen someone inflate before." he says.

But it's too late to stop it. As Tails finishes his sentence, the tips of Amy's ears sink in, leaving her as a round ball. Her dress and panties roughly indicate where her parts used to be. Her face is planted on the patch of tan and pink on top. Her skin has seemingly taken on a rubbery sheen.

Tails walks up Amy, who is still as tall as she was, just extremely round. He looks her over.

"Well, what do you think?" Amy ask.

Tails grins. "Well...you look really cute like that."

Amy's eyes widen. "But I'm a round ball. I barely even look like myself anymore."

Tails sways his tails a bit. "That's true...but it does..." he chuckles "...expand the list of stuff we can do."

Amy blinks. "Ok...if you say so..."

They keep the shell and look for more things

Amy's legs start to reappear slowly and Tails pumps rapidly. He is sweating very hard just trying to help his date. Amy's arms also start to reappear and soon enough, all her limbs are now back to normal. Amy's head finally pops up and she is back to normal.

"There, all done," Tails says proudly. He takes the nozzle out and she begins to inflate again.

"Tails! I need something to plug me up!" she shrieks. Tails runs all over the beach, trying to find something. He finds a shell, and sticks it in her mouth. Now she looks like a balloon, and is floating in the air. Amy can't talk since a shell is in her mouth.

"Amy, I'm sorry this happened."
Amy looks at him sadly and nods her head as to say, 'me too.'

Tails pulls her along the beach and all of a sudden, see's a bottle of wine. "Maybe we can use the cork to plug you up so you can talk easier!"

Amy starts to get flat as the pump removes the air from her. As soon as Tails has enough proof, the fills Amy back up. Eventually, Amy is back to her new perfectly round self.

Tails smiles. "Well, that proves it: You've completely lost your old form. As far as I can tell, you'll be like that for the rest of your life."

Amy just grins. "Well, since you don't mind me being like this...I guess I'm just going to have to learn to like it."

"That's the spirit!" Tails says.

Amy giggles as Tails starts to roll her down the beach. "So, now that you're a ball, what do you want to do?" Tails asks.

Tails just sits back and watches his round girlfriend expand before his eyes, enjoying the show nearly as much as Amy is enjoying the inflation. As Tails relaxes, he starts to nod off. With Amy enjoying herself too much to care about her size, him falling asleep will end up with her being much bigger than he'd anticipated.

As Tails began to relax greatly, he does start to drift off into sleep leaving Amy just enjoying the feel of growing from big to large to gigantic

After a short while he is awoken as he starts to feel a push from Amy as she grows massively. At this point she has grown to atleast 150 feet wide. As Tails wakes up he is startled by the sight of this enormous pink ball so he quickly flies over and stops the pump.

1121.content:
Amy lightly bops Tails on the head, which she's learned is the quickest way to keep him from rambling on and on.

"Eh he he, sorry about that, Amy..." Tails says as he rubs the back of his head.

Amy finds this just too adorable and can't help but give him a hug. "So Tails...you said you wanted to surprise me with something. We don't seem to be doing much besides talking, so what was it?"

Tails chuckles. "I was hoping to spring it on you when you least suspected it, but I might as well give it too you now." he says, handing her a small, gummy-like object

She turns it in her hands a few times, wondering about it. "Ah, is this some kind of weird snack or something, Tails?"

"Yes, as a matter of fact, but that's not it's only function. You wouldn't mind testing it out for me, would you?" Asks Tails.

She gives it a quick sniff, noticing it smells slightly like berries. "I'm sure it won't hurt since you're asking me to try it, so sure thing, Tails!" she says, as she pops the object into her mouth. She tries to chew it but it feels like it just won't be broken apart, though it doesn't offer much resistance as far as being squashed. She swallows it, and it's thick enough that she can feel it slide down all the way into her stomach. "Oh my, rather filling, don't you think Tails?" asks Amy, unaware of how right she'll end up being, possibly...
1121.title: The Reveal

11212.content:
Amy groans. "Ugh...what did you feed me, Tails? I feel so...hollow?" Amy blinks, as she realizes the feeling also came with a new, rubbery look.

Tails smiles. "Well, you can't deflate if you're not a balloon..."

Amy blinks. "Balloon? Deflate!?" Amy yells. Amy looks down to see that she is starting to deflate, feet first. "Tails, stop this!" She yells, as she slowly starts to slump to the ground.

Tails grins. "Don't worry Amy, I'm sure you'll enjoy it." he says.

Amy sighs, realizing that she wasn't getting out of this. All she could do is wait as she her body slowly deflated into a pile on the ground. "I guess this isn't so bad..." she says. "In fact, it's kinda fun."

Tails grins as the last of the air escapes from Amy, leaving her flat and crumpled on the ground, with a light smile in her face. He grabs Amy by the top of the head, and then lifts her until she is at eye level with him. "Well, what do you think now, Amy?"

"Well, I have to admit, this is very pleasant." Amy says, with a grin.

Tails looks Amy over. "Aww...you're all wrinkled up...that won't do at all...but I can fix that." Tails says.
11212.title: Airless Amy

choices: Try to blow her up into a long balloon.
She how far she can REALLY stretch!
112122.content:
Tails knelt down, lifting Amy's flat head to his lips. Blowing into her mouth, she began to regain volume. Eventually, she looked just like she used to, albeit with a rubbery sheen.

"Oh Tails!" Amy said with a smile. "That felt wonderful!" She reached out to hug him... and her arms stretched out and looped around him a couple of times. She leapt back with suprise.

"Huh, that's new.." Tails said, looking at the pair of pink arms that were still encircling him. "I guess since your body can blow up like a balloon, it should be natural you can stretch like rubber too."

"Hee.." Amy giggled, untangling her arms. "I'm liking this more and more." She stretched out as tall as she could.

"I agree." Tails said. "So, what should we do next?"

Amy giggles, with her body stretched out to around 50 feet tall. She stretches her neck down so that her head is in front of Tails and smiles. "Hehe...come up here, Tails. I just thought of a great idea!" She says as she lets her neck go back to normal.

Tails shrugs and flies up to where Amy's head is. She grins. "Now, start blowing me up so I can become a nice, long balloon." She says, motioning over to a building she's just a little taller than.

Tails nodes, and flies down onto the building. "Ok, then. Let's get going with this." Tails says, as he lip-locks Amy and begins blowing the girl up. Amy's body widens just a little, but each puff makes her much taller as she inflated into a longer balloon.

Tails kept inflating Amy for what seems liked an hour, making her body as wide as she was tall and a mile long. Amy giggles a little. "Hehe! More! I want to stretch for miles, Tails!" Amy exclaims.

Tails seems like he would be perfectly willing to do so if he wasn't exhasuted. "Erf...I didn't want to stop...but I'm just too tired..."

Amy just giggles and literally wraps her arms around Tails. "Awww...but I understand. You did get me pretty big, but I still want to get longer!"

Tails nods. "Well...hehe, let's get back to my lab then. Besides, I want to try something out, first..."

Amy's face lights up. "Oh? What is it?"
1121221.title: Mile Long Hedgehog

choices: Make Tails long like she is.
11212212.content:
"Well, first, I'm going to need to get you to my workshop." Tails says, as he tries to think of a way to get Amy there.

------------------

Tails chuckles as he arrives on top of Amy, who is slitering along the ground like a snake after discovering she can move her body on her own. Tails hops off as Amy comes to a stop. "All right, now just wait here while I get the helium, ok?"

Amy nods and giggles. "Hehe...I'll be able to get really long if I'm not restricted to the ground!" Amy thinks as she coils herself up. After a few minutes, Tails comes out with what looks like a modified air compressor. "This will fill you up with enough helium to float a good distance off the ground but not enough to float away." he says as he plugs a hose hooked to the compressor into Amy's mouth.

Amy giggles as she starts to grow even longer. After a while, she starts to float into the air. As she does, she uncoils herself and lets her lengthening body hang freely in the air. She giggles as she grabs Tails by stretching out her arms and then holds him close. At this point, her body is around ten miles long. She giggles and spits out the hose, seemingly satisfied. "Hehehe, this will do for now, Tails." She says while wrapping her arms around him a few times.

Tails grins as he looks Amy over. From her neck, her body quickly grows thicker until it's three feet wide. From there, his eyes follow the rest of her body, which loops and flows all around them. "So, how does it feel to be like that, Amy?" he asks.

Amy responds by giggling. "Hehe, it feels really nice, though I can't find a way to explain how." She says, as she says as she unwraps her arms and stretches her torso around Tails until they're face to face. They look into each others eyes for a few moments before intimately kissing each other. Amy giggles when they finally break the kiss.

"So, what do you want to do now, Amy?" Tails asks.
11212212.title: Oriental Dragon-like

choices: Amy's ready for whatever is next.
1121222.content:
"Hehe...why don't we run a few tests to see exactly how far you can stretch, Amy." Tails says.

Amy giggles. "Sure. I have to admit that I'm pretty curious about that, too."

After a trip to Tails' workshop, Amy ends up having her legs clamped down at the ankle to a wrench that Tails typically used for lifting heavy loads. She is laying down on a table with her hands up as Tails clamps ther arms down to the table in the same way he clamped down her legs. The clamps are extremely tight, practically flattening her wrists and ankles to whatever they're attached to. "Now, don't worry about getting snapped in half or anything like that, Amy. The wrench is designed to stop turning when it detects that the cable, or in this case your body, is in danger of snaping. It also has a guage to determine how much of you has been wound into it, so when you reach your limit we should have a good idea of how long you can get." Tails explains.

Amy nods. "Ok, then. I trust that you know what you're doing. I'm ready whenever you are."

"Ok, then...oh, and I should add that it'll start out pretty fast since it will have no problem stretching out your body. As more stress is put on your body, it'll slow down so that you don't suddenly snap or something." Tails says.

"Ok, I'm ready, then." says Amy, grinning a little.

Tails nods and activates the wrench. Amy squeals a little as she feels her body quickly stretch out and become wound up around the wrench. Tails smiles as wells as he watches the counter on the wrench counts up around 100 feet of Amy every second. Once Amy's body reaches the half-mile mark, the wrench quickly slows to a stop, leaving much of Amy's body as thin as a telephone wire. Tails grins as he gently rolls the wrench up to where Amy's head is and unclamps her arms. "Now, how's that fee, Amy?" He says as he turns the wrench so that Amy's hands and head are facing upright.

Amy grins. "It feels wonderful, Tails!" she exclaims, giggling as she runs her hand over her wound up body."

"Good, then you won't mind moving on to the next test, won't you?"

Amy scratches her head. "Well..."
1121222.title: Wound instead of Round.

"Aww, but I just got stretched out. Don't you wanna see what I'm like when I'm not wound around this wrench?" Amy asks.

Tails' curiosity suddenly gets the better of him, which causes him to suddenly desire to see what effects the stretching has had as well. "Ooooh...nice idea, Amy." he says as he grins and presses a button on the wrench. Soon, Amy finds her body being 'poured' onto a collection dish. As her body continues to drop into the dish, she begins to look less like a hedgehog girl and more like a giant pasta dish. Amy and Tails can't help but grin as this thought enters their minds.

Amy nods. "Heh, yeah. Why be almost-fluid when you can actually be fluid? I want to have some fun with this...maybe do what I just did to you to someone else?"

A mental image of how perfect such a thing would work on the right person flashes into Tails's head, though he tries to shake it. "Well, I don't know...it is kinda crude..."

Amy giggles. "I suppose you're right, but that doesn't mean I still can't make them soft and putty-like." She says, somewhat enthusiastic about it but less so than with what she proposed.

"Besides, I bet you'd rather be among the stars than watch them, wouldn't you?" asks Amy.

"Among?" Tails asks in return, as a rather odd thought pops into his head.

A few months earlier he'd devised a way for a living being to live out in space without the use of external life support, but never reported what he discovered do to it's rather unusual effect on the living being, although he knew that it work since he tested it on himself within a vaccum. The effect in question was that it caused the subject to swell up like a balloon. Needless to say, as soon as Amy's words entered his mind, he began to have thoughts of Amy and possibly himself almost literally being among the stars.

Amy giggles, unaware of what was on Tails' mind. "You know, fly out into space and stuff like that? Surely you'd know what I'm talking about, right?"

Tails blinks as he zooms back to reality. "Oh, yeah. Of course." he says, unable to shake the thought he just had. While he didn't want to subject Amy to suddenly becoming a living balloon because he wanted to see her like that, he was having a great deal of difficulty thinking about how much he wanted to see her like that."Should I tell her...and ask her if she wants to... he thought.

Amy noticed that something was up with Tails from the moment she asked him about the stars. "Are you feeling alright, Tails?"

All that registers to Tails is that Amy had asked him a question, and he responds with all that his mind can manage to come up with. "Do you want to be a planet-girl?" he suddenly blurts out, seconds before he clasps his hands over his mouth.

"Errr...is that some kind of pop song or something? I've never heard of one like that before...does it have a catchy beat?" Amy asks.

Tails sighs. "Uhm...no. It isn't...Amy, there's something I have to tell you, but you'll probably be weirded out..." he says, as he begins to explain.

"...and that's what's been on my mind for the last few minutes." Tails says.

Amy blinks, already having a response ready for Tails. She goes over to him and gives him a hug. "For you, I'd do anything. I'll gladly become a planet-girl if that makes you happy."

Amy scratches her head. "I...actually don't know. I think I'd rather have you with me than on me. What I'm saying...is that I'd really like it if you'd become a planet with me!"

Tails blinks. "Well, she is doing this for me...

1132.title: Odd place for gum.

"I think I have enough to blow a bubble." Amy says. She attempts to blow a bubble, and does so. The bubble gets about half as wide as she was tall before it pops all over her.

Tails chuckles. "Too big?" he asks.

Amy blinks. "Yea...anyway, I'm gonna try to get this stuff out..." Amy says, as she heads toward the boardwalk. Tails follows close behind.

---

Amy and Tails are standing near a few water fountains. Amy is trying to use the cold water to wash the gum out, but it almost seems like it's merged with her fur.

"This stuff is so hard to get out..." Amy says, as she tugs at her hair. The gum now covers most of her body.

Tails smiles. "Well, we could wash you off in the ocean...the salt water might loosen up the gum a bit."

Amy nods. "I guess you're right."

Tails heads back toward the beach, and Amy starts to follow, but as soon as the gets to a stairway leading to the beach, he hears a plop. He turns around to see Amy laying on her back. "What's wrong, Amy, I mean, besides the fact that you're covered head to foot in gum."

"I can't move. My entire body feels numb." Amy says.

Tails walks up to her. "Do you need any help?" Tails asks.

Amy nods. "Yea...get me to..." suddenly, her body appears to be melting into a puddle. "...GAH! Tails, w-what's going on!? I feel weird!" she yells.

Tails is shocked to the point of being speachless. All he does is watch as Amy slowly becomes a blob of gum.

"Tails! Help me!" Amy cries. At that moment, her face melts into the mass of gum, causing her to black out.

---

Amy opens her eyes to see Tails with a worried look on his face. "Wha...what happened?" she asks.

Amy looks normal, except for the fact that her entire body is pink, and she has no clothes on. Tails, just happy to see her alive, gives her a hug.

Amy smiles. "Thanks, Tails. But what happened?"

Tails sweatdrops. "It's hard to explain, but I'll try my best. You remember when you were first feeling funny, right?"

Amy nods, as she pulls herself off the ground. "Yea. I remember."

Tails nods. "Well, you were basicly becoming a giant wad of gum. However, soon after, the gum began to form into the shape of your body. You woke up soon after you reformed." Tails says.

Amy nods. "Ok...so I'm a living piece of gum...how long was I out for?"

Tails chuckles. "1 minute."

Amy sweatdrops. "I should have guessed. Anyway, what should we do?" Amy asks.

Tails and Amy find themselves unable to reform, and realize that it was a 'mistake' to let Cream have her way with them, seeing as she had done to them what Amy had done to Rouge earlier.

"I'm sorry, you two, but Cream wanted to make you into what she thinks would be a fun toy to play with, namely, a large sentient putty glob, and I couldn't resist going along with it." says Vanilla. "Besides, I'm sure you two will enjoy this fate." she says, to which Amy and Tails silently agree to, already enjoying it without Cream even having to do anything else.

Cream doesn't take long to grab Amy-Tails and start molding them into a less embarrassing shape. "Hehe, with a glob of putty as big as you guys are, I'll never be bored again. The only question is what I should do with you guys first!" Cream says, as she finishes forming Amy-Tails into a ball, which slowly takes on more of a bell shape due to gravity.
1132212222112212.title: Putty in Cream's hands.

11322122221122121.content:
With that, Amy and Tails happily spend the rest of their days from that point on as Cream's personal glob of putty, immensely enjoying what has become of them nearly as much as Cream and Vanilla enjoy playing with them. While unable to communicate in any perceivable way, Cream and Vanilla have no trouble at all sensing exactly how Amy and Tails feel as they mold and form them, which helps them considerably when trying to find new ways to play with them.

"Hehe, it looks like we all got what we wanted. You two are as close as you can possibly be, and me and Mommy will always have you to play with." Cream says one day, as she and Vanilla hug them a little, before they both go right back to work on molding them into whatever has caught Cream's imagination that day. Amy and Tails silently sigh contentedly, unable to imagine things any other way at this point. By now, Amy and Tails don't have a single desire to return to normal, preferring this fate to any other they can possibly think of, which makes it all the better for Cream and Vanilla, who certainly wouldn't be enjoying what they do with them nearly as much if Amy and Tails were not enjoying themselves as well.

"Well, let me get something to carry you in, and I'll run a few tests" Tails says, as he walks off. He comes back with a large jug, and pours Amy into it, then carries her off to his lab.

---

After the tests...

"Amy, I hate to say this, but you are stuck like that. Forever."

Amy gasps. "What?! Why?!" she yells, completely unnerved.

Tails sighs. "You see, when you became like this, your molecular structure was thrown out of wack. At that point, it was reverseable, but when I kneaded you, that caused whatever was still the old you to be broken down, reducing you to your current state...I'm sorry, Amy."

"No, Tails, it was my idea." Amy says, in a low tone of voice. "But I don't care now." She says, in a more cheerful tone.

Tails tilts his head a bit. "Wha? You seem happy about it..."

Amy giggles. "I am happy about it. I honestly never felt so good in my life. I think I'm going to rather enjoy life like this." she says.

"Tails! Wake up!" Amy yells.

Tails' eyes snap open. "Gah!" he yells, suprised from the sudden wake up call. He quickly looks around. It takes him a second to figure out what startled Amy.

"Wh-what's happening? Why have we inflated?" Amy asks.

Tails mumbles something uninteligible, then turns his head towards Amy. "Pressure difference. The air around us is less dense than what's inside of us, so the air inside of us wants to escape. This causes out bodies to swell until the pressure equals out."

Amy blinks. "Yea." She notices his tails. "But that really doesn't explain why your tails aren't inflated."

"That's a good question. Perhaps the air just can't get inside of them." he says.

Amy nods. "Where are we, anyway?"

Amy shudders a bit. "W-what's wrong now?"

Tails turns himself upright again. "I don't see anything but blue, except for a few clouds that happen to be below us."

Amy gulps. "So that means we're either upside down and you were looking at the sky, or we're high in the air and are floating over the ocean."

Tails nods. "You were right, Amy. We'll certainly have plenty of time to get used this."

Instead of being depressed or worried, Amy is smiling. "It looks like our date's turned into a honeymoon." she jokes.

Tails chuckles. "Who needs weddings when you have helium, right?"

Amy giggles. "Yea. You could say that."

Suddenly, Tails widely grins. "You know..."

125.content:
As they went to the roller coaster, they saw several of their friends and allies were heading for the coaster as well. Sonic was there, along with that new girl Tangle. Sally and Nicole were there, holding hands. Antoine and Bunnie were also holding hands as they came up. Rotor was arriving, along with Shadow, Rouge, and Omega. Omega was carrying a large plush, acting surprisingly protective of it.

"This large, cuddly thing is proof of my superior firepower!" Omega proclaimed.

"You used your gatling gun," Rouge said, looking annoyed. "You were supposed to use the cork gun."

"Target would not have been properly destroyed," Omega said poutily.

"You used too much firepower," Shadow grumbled. "He gave you that plush so you'd stop firing."

"I left the stand mostly intact!" Omega protested.

Others were there as well. Shade, Mina, Blaze, Silver, Marine, Honey, Sticks, Knuckles, Mighty, Ray, the Chaotix, a strange echidna girl who gave her name as Jewel (when she first introduced herself, she started to say something else, but hesitated and said Jewel) that Knuckles found oddly familiar... All of their friends. They all got onto the roller coaster, ready to have fun.

The ride started. Amy and Tails, sitting at the front, traded excited looks. The cart crested the first hill and zoomed down. Up! Down! Through loops! It was wonderful, and only and Sonic and Shadow seemed unimpressed. The two of them were quietly discussing getting out and making the cart go faster. As they approached a tunnel, though...

*KCHUNK. KCHUNK. KCHUNK*

One by one, lockbars appeared over every passenger, the track descending into darkness. Sally tried to calm everyone, but panic was starting to set in. Omega was trying to cut himself free with a torch, but it wasn't working. As they fought, the cart's seats grew walls, the train separating into separate carts, each containing one prisoner.

And then the lights turned on. Eggman symbols appeared in the darkness, Eggman's voice cackling wildly over the loudspeakers.

"A TRAP!" Shadow snarled.

"My new soft friend shall protect us!" Omega declared, aiming his guns at the lights.

Before anyone else could react, the carts separated, going down deeper and deeper, sliding wildly along many different tracks as they screamed in a mix of fear (and in the case of Shadow, Omega, Blaze, and Sonic) frustrated rage. Finally, they reached the end of their nauseating ride, the carts flying into the darkness in many different directions...

They landed hard, crashing to the ground. Tails and Amy looked around as best they could in the shadows, trying to find each other...

((Author's note: Yes, Jewel is meant to be Julie-Su.))

"As it happens," said the human maitre'd, "we just had a cancellation. We normally wouldn't, but I and our manager recognize you both as allies of the famous Sonic the Hedgehog, and fine heroes yourselves. We would be honored to host you, and let you eat for free for tonight as a reward for all you've done for us."

Amy and Tails grinned. "Awesome!" the cheered.

"Order whatever you like, however much you like," the maitre'd said. "We are happy to serve."

Amy and Tails went inside, escorted by the maitre'd to a large, regal table. The table was lowered to Mobian level, allowing them to sit normally and chat with each other. Around them, other couples ate up, one of the partners stuffing themselves tremendously. But Amy and Tails only had eyes for each other, making their orders and chatting as they waited for their food.

Scene transition!

1432.title: Convenience rules.

choices: It isn't hot out at all.

14322.content:
Tails chuckles. "See the slurpee machines over there?" he asks.

Amy nods. "Yea. You feel like having one?"

Tails smiles. "Actually, I had something different in mind. How about a bet?" he says.

Amy blinks. "What kind of bet?"

"How about you empty the machines? If you do, I'll pay. If you don't, you'll pay." Tails says, grinning.

"Are you nuts!?" Amy yells.

"It won't be that bad. Come one, the only thing you have to lose is the price of whatever's in the machines." Tails says.

Amy sighs. "Ok, I'll do it." She says, as she walks over to the machine and places her mouth below the nozzle, and starts the flow. Soon her belly starts to grow. Tails grins as he watches Amy bloat.

Amy groans, both from her rapidly expanding belly and from the slurpee headache she was getting. However, she was determined not to lose the bet.

---

About ten minutes later, the flow stops. Her body has grown by about 3 feet wide. Her limbs just barely stick out. She drops from the machine with a loud thud and hicups.

"So full..." Amy groans.

Tails grins. "Well, you showed me, Amy."

"Ugh...next time you're doing it." Amy says.

Tails drops two 20 dollar bills and a ten on the counter. "That should cover it, right?"

The woman at the counter was watching the whole thing. She was so confused that she could barely think of what to say. "Uhm...you know what...it's half off. You didn't cups or anything, so...yea." she says, taking a twenty and the ten. She gives Tails a five.

Tails grins. "Thanks." he says, as he walks out with Amy waddling close behind.

"...I'm going to need heavy therapy for this...I know it." the woman says.

The machines slip a elastic suit onto them. The suits look a lot like their normal clothes. (Or in Tails' case, his skin and fur.) Suddenly, the suits become sticky. As they do, the suits start to fuse with their skin and clothes. As this happens, a couple of tanks are pushed into their backs.

Tails thought about deflating, and 5 of the cubic feet left him into the tank.

"That's it! They're thought controlled!" Tails said. "All you have to do is think about inflating or deflating, and the tank will do the work. Try it!" he said, gasping for breath.

"I don't want snacks. I want a meal." Tails says, as he walks toward the fast food place.

---

Inside, the two walk up to the register, which is manned by a friendly yet ditzy looking male dog.

"Hello, there. Uhm..." Tails starts. He turns to Amy. "What do you want, Amy?" he asks.

"I'll have a burger. Just get a large box of fries and we can share them." Amy says.

Tails turns back to the dog. "Two burgers and the largest fry you have." Tails says.

"Uhm...we really try to make them all the same size. I don't think we have any that are large." the dog replies.

Tails facefaults. "Uhm, I meant the biggest box of fries."

The dog laughs. "Why didn't you say so." he says. With that, the dog brings up the their orders. "There you go. Two bugers and a large box of fries." He says, putting emphasis on the word 'box'.

Tails takes the food and grabs the box of fries. As they exit, he and Amy start eating the fries.

"Hey, these things aren't salted." Tails says. Amy reaches into the bag the food was in, and pulls out a few unlabeled packages that look like salt packages. She takes the fries and pours the 'salt' on the fries. "There." Amy says. They eat some more, then Tails speaks up.

"This salt tastes a little different that normal salt." Tails comments.

Amy shurgs. "Must be seasoned or something."

Meanwhile, the dog from the fast food place is looking through his pockets. "Hum...that's funny. I knew I had that prank salt stuff around here somewhere." he says. Then, he notices a few normal looking salt packages on the counter.

"...oh crap." he says. "We are so getting sued."

Meanwhile, Amy and Tails had finished eating their meal, and look somewhat bloated. Amy looks at herself and then at Tails. "Uhm, Tails. Is it just me, or are we getting, uhm, fatter." Amy asks.

Tails chuckled. "Fast food kind of does that to you." he says.

Amy points at their refections in a window. Their bellies seem to stick out about six inches. They are also stedily getting bigger. "Ok, now that is odd. Maybe the went through the deep fryer more than once?"

Amy shakes her head. "I don't think we're getting fatter. I think we're inflating." She says. At this moment, they are around one foot wide.

Tails pushes on his expanding body a bit. "Hum, now that you mention it, I don't really feel blubbery." Tails says.

"What are we going to do? What if this doesn't stop? We could..." Amy gulps. "...pop."

Tails just hugs Amy, at least he tries to, but he has trouble getting around his and Amy's body. By now, they are around one and a half feet wide. "I don't think that would happen. I mean, this can't last too much longer, right." As Tails says this...

145.content:
It was made of several wooden seats surrounded by a veritable forest of trees, with several lights spread though out.
basking everything in a pleasantly soft light. Tails walked over to one of the seats and sat down patting the bench next to him.
"C'mon Amy lets rest for a while." Amy smiled and sat close to him leaning against his shoulder. Tails Blushed at the contact
and glanced around, desperately trying to think of something romantic to say. He looked up at the dark night sky. "You know if
the park lights weren't on the star scape may be as pretty as you." He grimaced mentally, hoping that it didn't sound as corny to
her as it did to him. She smiled at him and opened her mouth to say something when the lights suddenly flickered off.

They both lept to their feet peering into the inky darkness around them. Then a high pitched and thoroughly annoying cackle
rang throughout the park. Tails cocked his head, his brow furrowed in concentration. He signs heavily and his shoulders
drooped. "Oh no. Not him." Amy looks at him confusion written all over her face "Who? Who is it Tails?" Just then a figure
emerged from the heavy shadows their outline hidden by a bilious cloak. "Glad you remembered me tails. Sorry to interrupt
your "date" but there is something I need to get from you."

There was a soft click then a lamp post turned back on, illuminating the portion of the park they were in.
The figure was a skunk clad in a dark green cloak covering a matching shirt and slacks, a pair of small glasses hanging from the
tip of his nose. "Florn, what in the world do you mean?" exclaimed Tails. Florn calmly pushed his glasses further up his nose
then sneered maliciously. "Sharp as always I see Tails? What do you have that a "mad" scientist could want, hmmm?"
"The chaos emerald!" gasped Amy and Tails in unison.

Florn's sneer widened slightly as he withdrew a bizarre object from the folds of his clothes. It was roughly the size and shape of
a pistol with a large bundle of cables hanging from it, disappearing behind his back. "I'm guessing that you wouldn't be stupid enough to
have the emerald with you so i'm just going to "incapacitate" you while I find it." He pointed it squarely at Tails's chest and fired, sending a
blinding flash of light towards him. Amy raised her arms to shield her eyes. When the flash faded away she lowered them to see Florn laughing
manically, but more importantly there was no sign of Tails. She looked around, desperately calling out " Tails! Tails!" No answer. She glared
over at Florn. "What did you do to him?"she growled. Florn only laughed harder. But his laughter was cut short as Amy slammed her piko hammer
into his chest sending him tumbling backwards, rolling head over heels then crashing into a tree and slumping into a heap with
a soft moan.

Panting heavily Amy looked around again for Tails. The area he was standing in was partially in darkness so she couldn't make out much.
She glanced over to the unconscious Florn. She had heard a click when the light had turned on so he probably had a
remote control or something. Amy ran over and crouched beside him. He moaned quietly as she began rummaging through his pockets.
In one of them she felt a box shaped object, pulling it our revealed a rectangle crammed with buttons separated into
marked groups. After a quick scan she found a section labeled park lights "Hmm, seems obvious." mumbled Amy pressing some of the
buttons randomly.

After a few seconds she had gotten the area well lit so she went back to look around where Tails had been before he disappeared.
laying on the ground was what looked like a large white and orange balloon. Puzzled Amy picked it up and turned it around. She
yelped as the dazed face of her date looked back at her blankly. The noise must have brought him round because his eyes refocused
and he asked Amy "What in the world happened?" Amy looked over him again finding a nozzle like protrusion and noticing that his skin
had taken on a rubbery elasticity. "Ummm. Tails, As far as I can tell his gun thing turned you into a balloon." "WHAT?" cried Tails.
Amy just shrugged,causing Tails to wave slightly. "Calm down Tails this guys a genius right? Well he probably has some way of reversing
whatever he did, He'd have to in case he made a mistake or something." Tails paused for a moment. "That's brilliant Amy! Quick get the
gun off him and take me back to my workshop."

Amy smiled and stretched him slightly, then tied him around her waist. "Oof. Amy!" His somewhat muffled voice complained.
Amy just giggled and patted him softly "Don't worry Tails well be at your place in a few minutes and this is the easiest way to carry you."

She walked back over to the still unconscious Florn and picked up the gun next to him then followed the wires to a battery pack clasped to his belt.
Amy unclipped it then giggled again as she re-attached it to her boy friend turned belt, tucking the gun part next to it.
she grinned at Tails who's face was situated at the side of her hip. "Ha ha. c'mon lets get home. This feels pretty weird."

Back at the the workshop Amy had Tails and the gun laid out on a bench. After inspecting the gun Amy found a knob
with several settings from balloon, at which it was currently set, to normal and other more bizarre choices.
"what in the world was Florn thinking?" Amy asked. "well he always was pretty eccentric, even for an inventor.
But any way try turning me back to normal and we'll look at it together." Amy places her hand on her chin thinking
while looking thoughtfully at the strand device. "Hmmm,

14521.content:
Tails looks around the edge of the settings knob while Amy stands behind him peering over his shoulder to see what he sets it to.
"C'mon, c'mon Tails whats it going to be?" Tails grins to himself as he decides and turns around. Holding the gun close to him to
hide the chosen setting. "Alright Amy could you please hop up on the bench" He motioned her to the bench he himself had been
laid upon earlier. "and we'll begin."

Amy Giggled happily and did as he asked. Eager to see what he had chosen. "So what is it, or I guess that should be what will I be?"
Tails simply points the gun at Amy and says "Malleable." Amy squeals in delight as she's engulfed in a flash of bright light.
When it fades and Tails eyes readjust Amy is still sitting on the bench looking at herself. "Tails as far as I can tell I haven't changed."
Tails walks over to her and places the gun and power supply on a shelf underneath the bench and pulls out what appears to be a large
rolling pin. Amy just stares at it for a moment until Tails asks her "So would you lay down please and we'll start the worlds most thorough
massage."

Amy raised an eyebrow and laid down "Tails I've got to ask you didn't set this whole thing up just to get here did you?"
"Hmmm? What do you mean?" He asked guilelessly "Oh this. I just make pizzas when Knuckles and Sonic come round to hang out.
Sometimes even Shadow comes round." "Right. I guess thats where you got the idea."

Tails smiled and positioned the rolling pin near her feet "Now, just relax." Tails starts putting his weight on the roller while moving it
forward as it touched Amy's toes a flattened doughy substance started appearing from underneath it. Tails noticed Amy's body was
slightly tensed. Worried that it might be hurting her he asked "How does it feel?" she looked at him her face unreadable.
"Weird, thats for sure, but not unpleasant, I could certainly get used to it." Tails smiled and continued rolling her flat.

Once she was completely two dimensional Tails put away the rolling pin. "So Amy can you move?" Amy twitched her right arm causing
it to wrinkle slightly on the bench. "A little." Tails gently smoothed her out again. "How about your shape can you control that?"
Amy's hand slowly lost it's definition then formed into a sphere then turn back into her unflattened hand "What that easy?" asked Tails
"Yeah, it was tensing a muscle." Tails grinned and grabbed her feet and pushed it into her chest then repeated the process until she
didn't resemble herself as much as she did a blob of dough.

Tails grinned and pushed his hand into her "And now we knead." He declared as he turned he ninety degrees and folded her in half then
repeated that for a few minutes. "So Amy, how do you feel?" Instead of answering Amy slowly reformed. Tails just watched
leaning against the bench. Once she was herself again she lent over and kissed Tails lightly on the cheek. "That was, relaxing."

Tails glanced out the window and noticed that it was getting dark. "Amy do you want to pack it in for the night and pick up tomorrow?"
Amy yawned then nodded. "But I suppose you'd better change me back first." Tails nodded and retrieved the gun from under the bench
and switched the knob back to normal then fired it at Amy when the brightness faded Tails replaced the gun and walked up to her
hugging her firmly. They left Tails' workshop and walked to Amy's place at the door Tails stood awkwardly beside the door. "Well it
certainly was an interesting first date." Remarked Amy. "Yeah we'll have to thank Florn sometime. So you want to come over tomorrow
and experiment some more?" asked Tails, glad to have something to say. Amy kissed him again and whispered "I'd love to. Remember it's
my turn fist tomorrow." into his ear then closed the door softly. Tails stood there for a few seconds than happily skipped all the way home, ideas filling his head.

The next morning Tails was typing something into his computer when he heard a knock on the door. "Must be Amy." He muttered as he stood up and went to answer the door, zigzagging through various projects to get there. He slid the door open to reveal his favorite pink hedgehog waiting for him.
Tails stands aside allowing her to enter. "Guess what Amy I woke up this morning with the brilliant idea to modify Florns device. I hooked it up to my computer and know it can do almost anything." Amy looked Tails up and down. "Have you had breakfast yet, or had any sleep for that matter?"

Tails shook his head "No not yet. Would you like to look at it for a bit while I shower and have breakfast?" Amy smiles at his absent mindedness and nods heading over to where tails indicates near a large computer standing against the wall of his shop.

After ten minutes tails comes back chewing on a piece of toast and looking refreshed. "So have you decided what you want to do?"

1553.content:
"We should probably see someone who knows a lot about the Chaos Emeralds," Tails said, looking thoughtful. "There's a problem with that, though..."

Amy blinked, rubbing her belly. "What's the problem?"

Tails sighed. "There are three people who know the most about the Emeralds: Shadow, Dr. Eggman, and Mammoth Mogul. I refuse to go near Mogul unless it's to hit him, Eggman will probably attack us, and Shadow isn't known for being cooperative. Plus, we'd probably have to go through Rouge, and you know how she is around gems."

Amy scowled. "Great... Some choices... What about Sonic?"

Tails shook his head. "Sonic knows how to use the power for himself. Beyond that, he freely admits he's clueless. The closest choice after the three I mentioned is Nicole, and her database is limited to what ADAM knew before his death..."

Amy frowned. "Well, we have to pick someone. I'm scared to use this thing again."

Tails sighed. "Sorry about our date," he said, smiling weakly.

Amy smiled. "It's okay," she said, kissing him on the forehead.

info.brief_description: Tails and Amy go on a...uhm...Date. And it's a big one. (Inflation and weirdness.)
info.description:
Tails and Amy have fallen for each other, for some reason or another. So now they are going on their first date, except they are not sure about what to do.

This is a body inflation story, so whereever they decide to go, it can be guaranteed that they will have a 'swell' time...

Please try to AT LEAST be neutral towards characters. I don't want to see anything like "Cream = stupid". You can let stuff happen to these characters, but do not needlessly bash them. Thank you.

Also, while it is perfectly acceptable to inflate Tails, please don't inflate any other male characters. And while popping is acceptable, if you use it on either Tails and Amy and it's irreversible, please end the story by having the other one burst as well, because I really want this to at least have Tails and Amy participating in the story. I noticed this happening, so yeah, that's why some of your chapters vanished.

Oh, and there's probably going to be stuff that won't sit with some young children, although it'll mostly be references and allusions and stuff.
